item.title: [Anthropic News] Claude is a space to think
item.description: We’ve made a choice: Claude will remain ad-free. We explain why advertising incentives are incompatible with a genuinely helpful AI assistant, and how we plan to expand access without compromising user trust.

item.title: [Anthropic News] Introducing Claude Opus 4.6
item.description: We’re upgrading our smartest model. Across agentic coding, computer use, tool use, search, and finance, Opus 4.6 is an industry-leading model, often by wide margin.
